title: Pyjama brand makes $2,500 in 24 hours after going viral on Instagram
text:
An Australian personalised pyjama company has made a staggering $2,400 profit in 24 hours after going viral on Instagram.

Midnight Mischief, who sell monogrammed t-shirts and silk shorts from $94 a set, sent their Hamptons print to YouTuber Shani Grimmond - with incredible results.

On Monday the 22-year-old posted about the design on her Instagram story, quickly generating the largest sale in a day the business has seen since they started in 2017.
